textTemplates.name: Email_SRLG_AT_Talc
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.litify_pm__First_Name__c},

We hope this message finds you well. At Saddle Rock Legal Group, along with our partner firm Andrews & Thornton, we understand the importance of providing personalized attention to our clients, and we wanted to check in with you regarding your Talcum Powder case.

As we navigate through this crucial process, we need to ensure that we have the most current and accurate contact information for you. Can you please take a moment to give us a call at 888-427-9607 or reach out by email at clientrelations@saddlerocklegal.com to verify your contact information, including your address, phone #, email address and emergency contacts?

We understand that each case is unique, and there may be other details that you feel are important to include in your case file. We encourage you to let us know about any additional information that you think may be relevant.

Having precise and up-to-date contact details is vital to ensure that we can communicate with you promptly, and avoid any potential delays in your case.

Should you have any questions or concerns about your case, please do not hesitate to reach out to Saddle Rock Legal Group at 888-427-9607 or Andrews & Thornton at 800-664-1734. Our team of legal professionals is here to provide you with the support you need.
Thank you for your trust in us. We look forward to continuing to work with you on your case.

Respectfully,
Saddle Rock Legal Group and Andrews & Thornton
clientrelations@saddlerocklegal.com
888-427-9607
800-664-1734

textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.litify_pm__First_Name__c},

We hope this message finds you well. At Young & Partners, along with our partner firm Whitley Law and Miller Law Group, we understand the importance of providing personalized attention to our clients, and we wanted to check in with you regarding your Camp Lejeune case.

As we navigate through this crucial process, we need to ensure that we have the most current and accurate contact information for you. We understand that each case is unique, and there may be other details that you feel are important to include in your case file. We encourage you to let us know about any additional information that you think may be relevant.

Respectfully,
Young & Partners Law Firm and Whitley Law and Miller Law Group

textTemplates.name: send_sms
textTemplates.text: {!$Record.Internal_Name__c} following up on your ongoing {!$Record.Case_Type_Name_del__c}, let us know if there are any updates to your file @ 888-427-9607.

textTemplates.name: YP_AT_Talc
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.litify_pm__First_Name__c},

We hope this message finds you in high spirits. At Young & Partners Law Firm, we understand the importance of this Talcum Powder case to you and your family, and wanted to check in. Andrews & Thornton is working diligently to gather all the necessary material in pursuance of your case.

As you are aware, while we are navigating this process, it is paramount that we have the most current and up-to-date information for you. Can you please take a moment to give us a call at 888-427-9607 or reach out by email at clientrelations@saddlerocklegal.com to verify your contact information, including your address, phone #, email address and emergency contacts?

Making sure we have accurate and up-to-date details is essential to ensure that we can communicate with you promptly and avoid any delays in your case.

With each case being unique, there may be other details you feel are pertinent to include in your file, we ask that you please reach out to let us know about any additional information you may feel is relevant.

Should you have questions or concerns about your case, please do not hesitate to reach out. Again our number is 888-427-9607 or Andrews & Thornton at 800-664-1734. Our team of legal professionals is here to provide you with the support you need.

Thank you for your trust in us. We look forward to continuing to work with you on your case.

Warm Regards,
Young & Partners Law Firm and Andrews & Thornton
clientrelations@saddlerocklegal.com
888-427-9607
800-664-1734
